         Marvin decided that he should probably avoid any food in here unless he planned on joining them.
         As he did so, he noticed that the game she was playing was familiar. Nada, a first person shooter. "Oh, hey. I know this game." Marvin began, as Amy was in a lobby as to not risk her wrath or hunger. "This is Nada, right?"
         "Yeah, you know it?"
         "My older sister plays it a lot. She has them all. Nada: Combat Developed, Nada 2, Nada 3, Nada3: ADHD, Nada Wars, Nada: Stretch, Nada 4, Nada 5, Nada Wars 2. All those remakes."
         "Why are you talking?" She asked.
         "I mean... She sometimes made me play. If I'm going to be here for a couple hours, might I play with you?"
         She put the controller down and knelt in front of Marvin, "Do you have any idea what you're offering? If you so much as mess up my matches, you're going in here." She pointed to her maw.
         "I'm aware." He said, now his pride was on the line as well as his life. He doesn't exactly know why he even bothered, but he'd rather be digested than bored.
         She poked his chest and soon he was at full size. She handed him a second controller, "Then play..."
13111112111111111111.title: Safe, but bored.

choices: Take her up on her offer
Just give himself to her instead?
It was a trick! She only wanted his guard to be down.
131111121111111111111.content:
Marvin did a fantastic job.
         There was a lot of pressure at first, but he managed to score enough kills to keep up with Amy. At one point, there had been a pro-player in the lobby and on the opposing team, and after losing the game, Marvin was sure that he'd be squirming around inside the woman's gut. Fortunately, she seemed to understand that it was the game's fault for paring two above average casuals to someone whom makes a profession out of it.
         Ultimately, it came up to 10 wins vs 1 loss.
         She smirked, "Damn. And here I thought you were just trying to commit suicide via digestion."
         "You were hoping I'd lose?"
         "Does it surprise you?"
         Marv shrugged, "I guess not." He lied back and rest himself on her bed as the game continued looking for a lobby for them. His eyes drifted to the back of Amy and her exposed midriff, as well as her chubs. Not a horrible amount, but an above average. He wondered if it was because of her inactivity or because of her voracious appetite. How much of that fat was once a guy like him?
         He heard a familiar growl coming from Amy. She turned around and saw him looking at her body, though he had an excuse now. Any earlier and he'd have explaining to do. She placed a hand on his knee and said, "Here's an idea. How about we double the ante?"
         "What do you mean?"
         "We play a ranked game. If we lose, I'll gulp you down. But if we win, I'll gulp you down."
         Marvin lifted a brow, "Wait, but how would-?"
         "And I'll let you out."
         Marvin paused and thought, "I thought you don't let prey out."
         "Yeah. Mom always said that men and food are synonymous. But you? You're just a tiny bit more than that. And if you don't want to go in," she placed a hand on her belly as it growled again, "I could just let you listen. I think you're into that, right? Or is it only with Beth?"
Should he accept her offer? Or should he reject it? Do women like being rejected?
131111121111111111111.title: An offer?

choices: Play it safe, go in shrunk.
Play it risky, go in as is
Don't play it at all, just listen to her belly as she plays.
1311111211111111111111.content:
"Deal!" He said.
         Amy gave him the player one controller and he quickly got into a ranked match lobby. For those who don't know, ranked matches keep records of your score and a kill/death ratio as opposed to unranked, just in case you don't understand the gravity of this situation. Numbers. She's going to kill him over numbers on a screen, should he fail her.
         "So do I need to win or do I need to raise you k/d?"
         "You need to do both." She said with a smile.
         "And if there's another pro running around?"
         "Then it's tummy time for Marvin." She lied on his lap as he began to play.
         Marvin must have gotten lucky or maybe he was better than he gave himself credit for. The other team were filled with scrubs and his team had mics that would communicate where the enemies were. His opponents didn't stand a chance. But that doesn't mean Marv hid in a corner and waited for his team to win. He was out there scoring points with a sniper rifle and rocket launcher until Amy whispered in his ear something that distracted him.
         "You're cheesing them, Marv. And looking cheese makes me hungry..." She then licked his ear, giving it a little nibble.
         Since that moment, he played correctly, even though sure the rocket spam was cheese but the sniper rifle was all skill.
         Then, he succeeded in getting the final kill with a melee attack!
         "I win." Marvin said, putting the controller on the bed.
         "So you did. Well, it was a gamble, and I lost." She shrugged, "I'm not used to losing."
         "If you don't want to do through with this, we don't have to." He reminded her. "I could just, you know, listen to it while you play."
         "So you don't want to go in?"
         "I do." He nodded. He just realized that this was the first time he admitted to want to fill up a gut without butterflies filling up his own.
         "Then I should congratulate you before hand one being the first person to ever be let out of my belly." She sat on his lap. "So, do you want to go in shrunken or go in as you are now?"
         Marvin thought for a moment....
         He's already experience the belly time twice already when shrunk, but he still enjoyed it. He kind of wanted to go for the nom without the shrink, but how easy would that mean letting him out? And it could make a lot of noise, waking up Jessica. But he really does want to go in like that...
1311111211111111111111.title: Winning a ticket into Amy's belly. But...

13111112111111111111111.content:
"I should go in smaller." Marvin said.
         "Oh? How come? Didn't you already do that with my sis?"
         "Well, if I go in as is, you're going to need a bit more than yarn to pull me out." Marvin said, not thinking as he found his hand reaching up and placing his palm on her exposed belly. "Besides, it'll be easier every way. I know you won't care if I end up as a midnight snack for your mother, but imagine having to lug me around at this size? And not have the calories you burned back? And you have to cough me up? A lot of effort just because I won you one game."
         "Daaah, thinking about your predator? Such a gentleman." As she spoke, Marv could feel himself shrink with his clothes still on him. He closed his eyes, and when he opened them, he was three inches tall and staring up at the giantess before him. May glared down and licked her lips. Her gut growled again, demanding that the prey be inside it at this moment. She leaned forward, lips parting, giving Marvin a clear view to her maw, but then she stopped herself and leaned back. She got off the bed and rustled through her dresser. The retrieved a ball of yarn and gave an end to Marvin. He did the obvious and tied it around himself as Amy sat at the end of the bed. She asked, "Do you want me to be rough or gentle?"
         "I would say... treat me like you would anyone else in my position. Without the whole digestion part."
         "No promises." She smiled and swiped a hand across the bed. Marvin felt the hand grab onto him hard and he felt his body being yanked away. Next he knew, he was hovering over her maw, tongue out, eyes locked of him! She dropped him! Then grabbed onto the string and lowered him in. When he passed the lips, she dropped him the rest of the way.
         Marvin's heart began to race as he looked around the humid, pink environment. Amy didn't give him any time to admire it though, as she swallowed him immediately without even closing her mouth.
         Once again, it was all dark, and Marvin felt the throat squeeze him on all sides. But it wasn't as tight as Beth's. Perhaps Amy was bigger? No! It was because Amy's body is capable of swallowing bigger foods. Marv imagined how tight it would have been if he was his full size. Then he realized that he missed any and all opportunity to be gobbled up whole as his normal size. Unless June could fit both him and Beth whole and unshrunk at the same time, he's never going to experience the sensation. It was... meaningless really. He shrugged the idea off as soon as he plopped inside her belly.
         It made a lout groooooan as he slipped inside, kind of like a greeting. He looked around, unable to see most of it since it was so dark. But he could imagine enough what he can't see. There was hardly anything in here but some cream soda here and there, pockets of it sloshing around.
         "Mmm!" The woman's voice hummed from above. "I forgot to eat today, didn't I? Don't worry... You'll get out...Maybe..."
         Marvin placed a hand to the stomach lining. He remembered what her skin felt like when his palm was placed on the exact opposite side and now he's in it. Past a layer of meat and muscle. As he pressed against the stomach, it stretched farther than Beth's has. Perhaps, again, because this place was made to hold people measured in feet, not inches.
         He's been in stomachs before, three or four at this point? He remembered that his older sister once swallowed him before by accident. She shrank him so she could have a 'mint' to snack on while she showered, as she did often, but then she swallowed him by accident when she knocked over a bottle of lotion and spooked herself into gulping him down. He didn't have much time to look around in there, though, she immediately coughed him up.
         But this place... It's possible he won't be getting out. That he will be entirely melted down by Amy simply because she didn't care what he or Beth will say.
         "So... how long will I be in here?"
         There was no answer.
         "Amy!" He called up, starting to think this might be it.
         "What? You said you wanted to experience all my prey gets. I don't talk to food. Relax, will you? And as this is the only time I'm talking to you, incoming." There was chewing noise heard above, then a gulp, gulp, gulp. Soon, the chips Marvin was looking at before were all streaming in with an entire can of pop. The liquids, not the whole can, though Marvin wouldn't be surprised- "Where's that recycling bin...? Oh well." GULP! And soon enough, the empty can was squeezed into the stomach.
         Now Marvin was up to his hips, lying on his back, stewling and sloshing as Amy got back into her game. The stomach clenched quickly and there was a loud URP from above.
         "Uh... Amy?" Marv said, "I think it's been a bit long, hasn't it?"
         No reply.
         Groan. Gurgle
13111112111111111111111.title: Permission to be inside Amy

choices: Amy comes back from a successful hunt
Jessica comes in and gulps him down!
Beth comes in for a quick kiss
Is... Is that a cat? Beth never said anything about a cat- it's a stray!
131111121111111111111111.content:
Marvin pressed both of his hands to the walls of her belly.
         His hands were pushing pretty deeply until they seemed to hit something hard. Then it pressed back just as hard. "You want out already?" Amy's muffled voice spoke. She must have put a hand to her stomach and fought back. "It's only been... Oh, shoot, nearly two minutes, yeah, I should probably get you out before you become soup."
         He felt his surroundings clench tightly before he was pushed into the esophagus.
         It happened too fast for him to really see or understand what was going on. Next thing he knew, he was on her hand, being scrubbed off with a piece of clothing from Amy's floor. She tossed him back on her pillow and said, "Alright, I'm going to go get someone to eat. I'll be back in a few."
         She got up and walked out slowly and deliberately doing a cat walk.
         It was at this moment Marvin realized that he had just survived being in Amy's belly. Swallowed by someone who was a swallower and someone whom wasn't a swallower...He must be really lucky or charismatic to be like this. He wasn't sure whose gut he preferred. Amy's stomach was stretchy and lovely, and much less cramped. But Beth's stomach was...Well, Beth's. And he was one of even fewer people to see the stomach of someone without the power and even fewer to get out without turning to nutrients.
         A thought then occurred to him. Why is he still shrunk?
         What if... what if she comes back and she didn't find anyone to eat? Is he going back in?
131111121111111111111111.title: Escaped!

choices: He woke up, full size, in the bed.
He woke up, shrunken, in... a stomach!
He woke up, shrunken, in a mouth?
He woke up, full size, in a stomach!
1311111211111111111111111.content:
Marv didn't have to wait too long for Amy to come back.
         It was about ten minutes before he heard the front door open and close slowly. He heard her step to the door and he bore witness to a large, squirming gut.
         The walked over to the bed, rather casually. He half expected her to walk like a pregnant woman but instead it's as if she walked unhindered. Is her spine okay?! She may have had a bit of chub to her, but she still had muscles if she was capable of lifting an extra hundred or so pounds.
         He could hear the squirms and pleas from inside her belly, as well as the sloshing liquids that will soon churn him into nourishing soup.
         "So." She said, noticing he was staring at her hard working gut.
         "So... I take it you're full?" He asked, still unable to look away. "Sorry, I've never been this close to-"
         "A well fed woman?"
         "A guy being broken down molecule by molecule slowly by means of acids? Yes, a well fed woman."
         She sat next to him and then picked up her controller. "Well, it's getting late, you should sleep."
         "Right." He finally managed to look away from that meat processing factory she calls a stomach and lied down on her bed, head on the pillows. Well, fingers crossed she doesn't take him in her sleep. "Want me to turn off the lights?"
         "Sure." She spoke.
         He was still small. He wanted to ask if she can unshrink him, but at this point he's pretty sure she has some room inside her. A simple burp could make space enough for him. He climbed over to the lamp and turned it off, so now the only sight source was coming from the television. That...that can't be good for her eyes.
         As he lied down and covered himself in the blanket, he realized he didn't have any spare clothes... well, there's plenty of clothes all around Amy's room that doesn't belong to her. Maybe he'll just take one of those for a souvenir before the teacher eats him.
         Before he could fall asleep, he wondered how it would be inside Amy's tight belly. The guy squirming inside could have been older or younger than him, definitely less lucky. Why is he even fighting back? Did he really think his life would end any other way? Maybe it's painful...The stomach did get active when he was inside. Oops. Eventually though, he managed to fall asleep.
1311111211111111111111111.title: This chapter really is just filler... Enjoy!

choices: Lie back in bed, maybe give Amy a tummy rub?
13111112111111111111111111.content:
Marvin's eyes opened slowly as he could hear the breathing of the woman beside him.
         He mostly only dreamed of moments like this, as most of the men who find themselves in this position don't last long. Then again, his whole life wasn't like most men's. Then he remembered...Today's the day... June is going to finally get her meal.
         He looked over at Amy, who must've turned him to full size before she fell asleep. She was above the covers, and h noticed that her tummy was all done with it's meal. Also, it seemed that she was kind of skinnier since last night? Before she ate the guy? Like somehow her body lost weight after a good hunt? He should have paid more attention in biology class.
         He stood up and got dressed in some of the clothes strewed about, whichever ones fit him the best. He also made sure they were men's sizes, considering that Amy might not be happy is Marvin started walking around in her clothes.
         He looked at the time: 5:55am. So what is he supposed to do now? Watch TV? Play games? Crawl back into bed with Amy? It's so early and he never knew what to do whenever he was at a friend's house and awoke before the host. He shrugged and decided to just sit down at the foot of the bed.
13111112111111111111111111.title: The Morning of...

131111121111111111111111112.content:
Marvin couldn't help himself.
         He's got time to burn. And besides, she slept late and was probably a deep sleeper. He lied back on her bed, and reached slowly to her exposed tummy. He placed a hand on it gently, his fingers and palms gently touching her skin. The air around him was cool, but her tummy was warm. He gently moved his fingers up and down her skin. On closer inspection, yeah, she did look slightly skinnier than when they first met, like, two days ago.
         Amy began to stir in her sleep and Marvin paused, continuing to rub when she stopped moving. Was...this even okay? What are the moral implications of touching a woman while she sleeps? Oh, look, it didn't stop him, he's still doing it. He lifted a second hand and began to rub with both hands.
         Amy began to stir again, but this time, she grabbed his hands and pressed them harder on her tummy before falling back to sleep. Oh? She likes it?
         Marvin swung a leg over her legs, and rested his body on hers. She didn't move. He gently and softly rested his head onto her bare belly, feeling the warmth and hearing the gurgles of her digestive system. He continued his rubbing, and it seemed Amy was yawning and waking up. "Mmm..." She began to murr?
         She must like it.
         Marvin continued to rub, and even grinded his head against it. He moved his hands to her hips and grabbed them, lifting his head and then plating a kiss in the center of her stomach.
         He felt her hands lift up and rub his arms.
         Then she grabbed them, with overpowering grips!
         She pulled him to her face, so that he could stare into her eyes. Her half opened eyes. He very sleepy, delirious, half asleep- oh no.
         She opened her maw wide...!
131111121111111111111111112.title: This is so wrong

choices: Tap the walls to wake her up, you want out!
Try to finesse your way out of her mouth. Can't be too hard, she's asleep!
Just sit tight, maybe enjoy your prolonged stay inside this hottie's maw
13111112111111111111111113.content:
When it was time to stir awake, Marvin was confused when he didn't immediately find any light when his eyes opened. As the feeling returned to his extremities, he felt himself compressed by slippery, lazy flesh. It was hot, slimy... familiar. Running his hands onto the surface, the buildup mucus and drool clued him in exactly where he'd wound up, along with the gentle bursts of air bristling his naked back.

He was in a mouth, most likely Amy's! When did this happen? He was sure he'd gone to sleep under the covers. Then again, the older sister stayed up longer than him playing games. And coming to think of it, he'd chosen to rest right on her pillow. She probably didn't take kindly to having her tiny guest in her spot. So, how better to move him and tickle her own oral fixation with a shrunken man?

The question of how came easily, knowing he was know straddled along the side of her pudgy tongue with the row of her right molars on his back. She must be on her side, and still asleep from the looks of things. Marv wondered what he could do. Clearly, waking her up wasn't a good idea, since an irritable girl was more likely to break her promises and swallow him out of spite. If he wanted out, he'd have to be clever, and precise.
13111112111111111111111113.title: The Morning Breath of Champions

131111121111111111111112.content:
Gurgle. Glorp.
         Marvin felt relaxed, lying back against the walls of her stomach. His feet were pressed up against the soda can, making him kind of wish she didn't swallow it. So what, not only does food come down here, but trash as well? How powerful are women's digestive systems that allow them to break down aluminium? Bones? Sure. Calcium? Sure. But metal? Who discovered that? And it's taking up so much space, too.
         He rubbed the wall behind him, hearing the heart beat above him in this dark, damp sac. The can no matter at this moment, is it? And it kind of has a smell to it that's better than the acrid air of the stomach.
         Groan. Gurgle.
         Her belly was starting to work up a storm... How long has he been in here? "Amy?" He called again. He listened carefully, and over the gurgling stomach, he heard the sounds of shooting. She's playing the game. Wait, if he distracts her, is he staying in? She never said anything about going back to playing the game. He pressed on the fleshy wall, "Hey, Amy? I'd like to get out now."
         "Dammit!" The belly shook as she cursed in frustration.

         Damn! There's that one pro again! Amy recognized the player's username. xXxCatherine69xXx. She had to prevent herself from jumping up in tension and excitement. She picked up her controller and focused as much as possible. She'll totally win this time!
         The game started and with a throw of a knife in the sky, Amy got a kill. But Cat also did the same thing; damn rookie team mates, already feeding her!
         Amy had played for so long that she memorized all the maps and all the weapon locations. She ran as fast as she could to the shotgun, but when she got it, she got hit with a sniper round. It was Cat! And she was camping the shotgun, so anyone else goes to grab it then they'll be killed as well. Soon after Amy's death, some other enemy went by and grabbed the shotgun. That might be even worse!
         They didn't last long though, when Amy spawned, she hunted down the shotgunner and stuck them with a sticky grenade. When they exploded, she glanced at the score. (Red) 2-2 (Blue.) But then came a tick immediately as she looked away. 2-3. The enemy scored a point! And this time it wasn't Cat getting the kill. Should she farm the other team for points or focus down Cat?

         "Amy!" Marvin cried out as he hit and kicked the stomach. The gurgling has gotten louder, the stomach was more active! The chyme was rising! "Amy! Let me out! You're going to digest me!" There's hardly any place to hide! Marvin had to swim over to the empty can and climb on top of it! He soon made it to the top, yelling up at his captor, "Amy! You have to let me- ah!" The stomach lurched forward, throwing Marvin off the can and into the acids.

         Amy leaned forward, her mind set entirely on beating this Cat lady. The score was neck and neck. 33-31 with a max score of 50. It was tense, and it required shear willpower and commitment. It's only been two minutes in and already the game was almost over. Both teams were full of scrubs other than the respected pros and Amy is pretty sure there's one on her team that would stop moving to shoot like a moron.
         But she's almost there! With a well placed grenade, she blew up two enemies next to each other, evening the score!

         From the outside of her belly, one could hardly tell there was a person sloshing from withing, one could only hear blorps and gargles as it worked very hard to process it's meal. It was calm, serene even. From inside, however, it was the exact opposite. The walls were moving, there was noise all around and it was so dark and cramp! "Amy, please!" The boy in her belly cried out, "I don't want to die! Not in here! We had a deal!" He managed to climb back onto the can, but as he did he noticed that the label was starting to strip off. Marvin wanted to cry. He was betrayed! Lied to! If he knew this was how it was going to go, he'd have not grabbed the string and instead would have suffered digestion in Beth's stomach.
         The air was getting thin, he couldn't hold out for much longer... Right before he passed out, he felt his body lurched upwards, his vision blurry. Maybe...maybe Amy is letting him out... Glorp

         Amy jumped and pulled the trigger, killing Cat from halfway across the map with a sniper rifle. The score screen rose up: 49-50! Amy won! She felt so smug and justified. "EZ EZ EZ NO RE." She typed in public chat. She felt something come from her gut and let out a loud BURP! She pat her belly as she say back down. Damn, that can was almost distracting. She shouldn't have swallowed it, even though she could totally rip it apart with her gut. If given enough time, she heard that some women could digest whole cars if they're small enough or in enough parts.
         She felt like she forgot something...
         It wasn't until she lied on her bed, ready to sleep, many games later, did she realize she just digested Beth's boyfriend!
131111121111111111111112.title: A game well played.

13111112111111111112.content:
He was being pulled away from the lips!
         It was only a second, before Marvin felt himself slip past the uvula as he slithered across the tongue. Everything went dark! He didn't have enough time to even comprehend what was happening, he only realized the horror that awaits him after his body was squeezed tightly by all sides and heard a loud GULP!
         Marvin was shocked as he was pulled down her gullet. He... he was swallowed whole! He heard her heartbeat become louder and softer, as the flesh surrounding him become oppressively hotter. He felt himself being squeezed and pressed out into her stomach!
         Aside from the smell, the first thing he noticed how small and empty it was. There was a puddle of bile but that was about it. Right, she hasn't eaten anything except him. Marvin was frozen stiff with shock, soon feeling the chamber around him lurch as Amy sat down, perhaps to play videogames.
         Marvin got his bearings together before trying to get back up. He noticed the stomach lining was a bit easier to push away than in Beth's belly. Perhaps that's because this gut could fit an entire guy inside it and stretch wide.
         He sat up and pressed hard on the stomach's wall, "Uh, Amy?"
         There was silence at first. Then a gasp! And her belly boomed as a hand slapped the outside of it. The stomach also shook, bouncing him around.
         He sighed in relief. "Oh good, so you didn't do that on purpose."
         "Right," She said, "Force of habit. Like I said-"
         "Sloppy seconds." Marvin said, patting the wall, "So uh..."
         "While you're in, how is it?" She asked, her stomach dipping in and out and changing shape as she must be rubbing her stomach from outside.
         "You were right, it's bigger than Beth's stomach."
         "Good! The whole two minute countdown already started, so enjoy the sights while you can."
         "Wait..." Marvin tilted his head, a brow raised, "You're going to let me out though, right?"
         "Of course not, silly."
         "What?!" he nearly jumped as his heart lurched.
         "Remember what I told you? You aren't getting out. Food belongs in bellies, you're in my belly, so you're my food."
         "But I'm not food!"
         "Then why are you in my belly?"
         "Because you ate me! Swallowed me by accident!"
         "Is that your way of admitting you're food?"
         "What about that deal you made with Beth?"
         "Right... oh well. Now pipe down, I gotta finish this level."
         Marvin felt the stomach shift from under him as Amy leaned forward in a slouching posture. Marvin pleaded, begged, kicked and cried out but Amy simply shrugged him off. "Let me out! Please!" He'd yell. It didn't work. He was doomed to Amy's digestive system, unable to last much longer than any other piece of food that was here, including other prey.
         She wasn't joking about the whole two minute thing.
         In the end, it wasn't Ms. June or even Beth that did Marvin in, but rather some accident and pride that ended with him being calories.
         Before passing out, the last thing he heard was Amy giving off a small 'urp' and a small chuckle.
13111112111111111112.title: Amy swallowed him down

choices: The two of you spent the night snuggling... mostly
Beth was ready to fool around
1311111211111111112.content:
Amy handed you back over to her sister, Beth's warm fingers closed around you and she clasped you to her chest. David sighed as he ran after Annie, the hyperactive little blonde girl easily outpacing the seven year old. David was tired of trying to keep up with the little ball of energy, and his attempts at tag had devolved into tired shambling. They had been playing for almost 15 minutes, and Annie had yet to stop sprinting. David tried to follow along, but he was so out of it that he didn’t notice Annie slipping until she slammed into him.

They both fell to the ground, giggling, and the two seven year olds just lay there in a heap. But then David noticed an excellent smell in the air. He just sat there, enjoying it, until his eyes fell on Annie. Right then, he knew that she was the source of that wonderful smell. He began to wonder what would it be like if he just took one...small...taste…*Shlrp*

“Ack! Gross, David! Why the heck didja lick me?” Annie shot up, rubbing her hand as she glared miniature daggers at him.

“I-I’m sorry, you just smelled so good.” David replied dejectedly, looking at the ground.

Annie sighed “Look, that was really gross, but if you’re gonna be all mopey about it, then I guess I can forgive you.” She stated, a small smile and blush beginning to form on her face. David smiles at that, and the two get up to continue playing.

“Hey, Annie. I got a trick I wanna show ya.” David said shyly, with a little hint of excitement. Annie was quick to jump on it. “Oh yeah, what’s that?” She asked with an impish smile. David just smiled, and took an apple off of the tree they were sitting under. He brought it up to his mouth, and it looked like he was going to take a bite, right up until his mouth stretched around it. He took a massive gulp and, after looking strained for a few seconds, a bulge traveled down his neck to his stomach. Looking entirely too satisfied with himself, he turned a grin on Annie, who was sitting there with a dumbfounded look on her face. Nothing happened for a moment, until Annie burst with a shouted

“Cool! Oh man, I don’t think I’ve ever seen someone do that. Waitwaitwait, I’ve got the best idea. Open up.” David, a bit confused, but more happy than anything else, did as he was told, and within a few seconds Annie had shoved her hand down his throat. David practically melted from her taste, and eagerly accepted as she shoved her arm further down.

“I wanna see how far down I can get my arms. I think someone might have swallowed an entire apple before, but something as big as my arms? We’ll be recordsetters!” Annie said happily, as she brought her other arm up, placing it in his mouth. He accepted it happily, his mouth stretching easily over both of her arms. She seemed to be going down far easier than the apple, and her taste was absolutely amazing. After just a few gulps, he was up to her shoulders. Annie started to talk, but David was suddenly far too hungry to stop.

“Alright David, that should be far enough. Man, I can’t wait to see the look on *-mmmfffffff*” Annie started to say, before David’s hungry maw covered her face. His tongue slathered all over her face, savoring her hair. She screamed into his throat, but David heard next to nothing, feeling only a pleasant vibration. She tried to wriggle herself back out, but his throat had a good hold on her now. He worked her shoulders into his mouth, grabbing her around the waist and giving her a massive tug upwards.

He gleefully ran his tongue over his wriggling meal, as he sucked her in down to her hips, leaving only a pair of tiny legs swinging wildly in the air, dangling out of his mouth. He took her shoes off, and then resumed gulping down his delicious friend. Her knees, ankles, and finally her feet vanished within his hungry maw, and with a final gulp, the rest of her went down his throat, bulging it out before it returned to normal.

David gave a euphoric sigh as he rubbed his bulging belly. The energetic girl was thrashing up a storm in there. His belly was shaking, with bulges of her hands and feet dotting the surface. He could hear her muffled voice, but barely. All of a sudden, he shot up, hands coming to his mouth!

1411.content:
David was unable to hold back a massive belch! As much of the already sparse air the girl had in there was expelled from his mouth, his stomach contracted even more tightly around Annie, making her outline in his gut even clearer. This turn of events only caused the girl to redouble her efforts to escape - but all her struggles served to do was elicit a satisfied coo from David’s lips.

Goodness! He had always enjoyed gulping down a lot of food, just because he loves the satisfied, full feeling… but this was on another level entirely! Not only was Annie such a big meal that his belly was almost the size of the rest of his entire body, but the way she squirmed and pressed against the sides of his gut was like getting a masterful massage from the inside.

He had only a vague idea of what exactly happens to food once it reaches the stomach, but he had enough of an idea to know that Annie wasn’t getting out of there in one piece. This thought should probably be disturbing to him… but all he could think about was how delicious she tasted, and how euphoric her every movement felt. This was the best sensation he’s ever experienced! Something bad couldn’t possibly feel so good… so, David reasoned, eating Annie must’ve been a good idea.

“Oh, Annie…” He managed to mutter inbetween groans and gasps. “How did… you do… that?” He still assumed that fitting into his belly was some sort of trick on Annie’s part - he didn’t yet realize that his belly has always been stretchy enough to fit people inside. He will, though, in due time. For now, all he was concerned with was dealing with the aftermath of his seemingly impossible meal.

He frowned a bit at Annie’s muffled cries as his belly starts loudly gurgling away at her. If she didn't want to be in there, why did she practically crawl down his throat? It’s not like there was much he couldve done to avoid this outcome. Or, at least, thats what he told himself to avoid any guilt. “I can’t get ya out of there, Annie…” He sighed, drumming the sensitive, distended flesh with his fingers. “Just… calm down… try to get used to it…”

He didnt know if he could hear her. Since he didnt really know anything about acid and its gruesome effects, he didnt really know why she was struggling so much. She must be exaggerating. His tummy was comfy and soft on the outside, so it must be even more so on the inside. Sooner or later, she’ll see.

He could only lay there on the grass, rubbing his hands over the distended, sensitive flesh of his gut, and feeling himself grow more and more drowsy for some reason. Little did he know, he was slipping into a food coma. Feeling the delightful sensation of someone massaging his belly from the inside, relaxation overtook him, and it didnt take long for David to slip into a deep slumber… leaving Annie alone with the merciless, impartial grip of the boy’s gut.

Energetic as ever, she held out for hours in there, her squirms only serving to give David pleasant dreams. Eventually, though, her struggles were forcibly brought to a close - not because she had a lack of energy or anything, but simply because she had been so thoroughly gurgled up at that point that many of her ligaments had been digested, preventing movement. With that, merciful unconsciousness overtook her, as his gut continued working away at its meal…

… some time later, David was awoken by a voice in the distance. “David! Oh, Daaavid!” It was his mother calling out to him! He shakily pulls himself to his feet, realizing that his gut was still quite big and round, though not nearly as big as it was a few hours ago.

“Over here, mom!” He called, waving a hand while trying to hide his still digesting gut with the other. His mother trotted over to him.

“Oh, there you are! I’ve been looking all over for you!” His mother chuckled, relieved, as she walked over. When she was close, though, she noticed a mysterious absence. “Hey. Where did Annie run off to?”

He shuddered a bit. He did not fully understand digestion, but he knew he would be in a lot of trouble if anyone knew what happened. “Oh! Uh… she went home!” He nodded, a little too enthusiastically.

She gave him a weird look. “Ah. I… see,” she said, before turning. “Well, let's get back to the house! Its time for dinner!”

“Ooh… I dont know… I dont have much of an appetite…” He groaned as he followed along after her, feeling his still round gut, thinking he couldnt bear to eat another bite…

From then on, David was the only one who ever knew of his friend’s fate. Over the next week, his meal added a solid 10 pounds to ‘im, which he considered a satisfying memento to remember her by. Even as he moved on to more exquisite cuisine, nothing he ate from then on seemed to compare to the taste and feeling of swallowing someone whole. He couldnt wait for his next opportunity to try out his newfound power...
